trans-unit.source: Defines the writer, resource, print ticket, and package relationship settings that are associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"></xref> class for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> and specified interleave order.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document that the packaging policy applies to.
The order in which to interleave document elements.
Acquires the resource stream for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
The resource identifier of the color context.
The resource stream for the that has the specified resourceId.
Acquires the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
The resource stream for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
Acquires the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font.
The resource stream for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that has the specified resourceId.
Acquires the resource stream for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref>.
The resource identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] image.
The resource stream for the that has the specified resourceId.
Acquires the resource stream for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
The identifier of the resource dictionary.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] resource stream for the that has the specified resourceId.
Returns a list of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*> for the current page content.
The list of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*> for the current page content.
Acquires the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
Acquires the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
Acquires the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
Acquires the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current page.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
Acquires the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.

Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
To be added.
Stores a specified <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> as part of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
The print ticket to store as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
Prepares to commit the current page to the output store.
Adds a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> with a specified name that associates a specified resource with the current page.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource to associate with the current page.
The identifying name of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> that associates the current page with the specified resource.
Adds a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> that associates a restricted font with the current document.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the restricted font to associate with the current document.
Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that you want to release.
Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref>.
Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
Releases the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
Releases the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
Releases the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
